key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: Update the GUI after the given number of seconds.

key.name: cpu-meter
key.description: Turn on or off the CPU indicator.

key.name: memory-meter
key.description: Turn on or off the memory indicator.

key.name: storage-meter
key.description: Turn on or off the local disk usage indicator.

key.name: network-meter
key.description: Turn on or off the network traffic indicator.

key.name: swap-meter
key.description: Turn on or off the swap usage indicator.

key.name: load-meter
key.description: Turn on or off the system load indicator.

key.name: position
key.description: Controls the vertical alignment of the indicator widget on the top bar.

key.name: layout
key.description: Controls the layout of the drop-down information panel. It can be horizontal or vertical.

key.name: memory-calculation-method
key.summary: Memory calculation method for process list sorting.
key.description: Controls which type of memory needs to be included when computing memory usage for a process.

key.name: show-activity
key.description: When the indicator value raised above the given treshold, then the indicator icon gets a circle transparent background until the next refresh.
